name: Dark Father
description: The Dark Father is a large undead creature that exudes a formidable presence, possessing natural armor and a skeletal appearance that reflects its mastery over necrotic energy. It appears to glide through shadows with an air of malevolence and has notable abilities that enhance its effectiveness in combat.
memorable: The Dark Father's ability to absorb corpses and drain life through necrotic attacks makes it a truly terrifying adversary.
goals: To drain life from foes and maintain control over dead bodies.
relations: Typically encountered alongside other undead entities or necromancers.
environment: Commonly found in dark, forgotten places and locations of death.
strengths: Immunity to necrotic and poison damage along with resistance to nonmagical physical attacks.
weaknesses: Notably weak in Strength, indicated by a low score of 6, which affects its physical attacks.
attacks: Uses Life Drain to inflict heavy necrotic damage while also potentially reducing a target's maximum hit points.
most_powerful_ability: None May Stop Death, which penalizes creatures that regain hit points, making it difficult for opponents to recover during combat.
senses: Has darkvision, allowing it to see in dark environments up to 60 feet.
skills: Excels in stealth, making it effective at evasion and ambush tactics.
additional_information: Can pass through objects and creatures due to its incorporeal nature.
Limited flying ability enables mobility and escape strategies.
Immunities to various conditions make it hard to control in combat.
Uses stealth to ambush unsuspecting targets effectively.
Has high skills in disrupting enemy spellcasters.
spellcasting: Can counter evocation and necromancy spells using abilities like Banish Hope.
test_queries: dark undead creature that drains life
powerful necrotic entity with life drain
mobility enhanced undead with special abilities
